Classes

class  gaia::graphics::Drawer
 A Drawer is a general abstraction for "an object used to draw something." Most often you will deal with Drawer as the type of resource retrieved for drawing things to the screen; the Drawer class provides a generic API for dealing with an underlying visual resource that may take a variety of forms. More...

namespace  gaia
 

Enqueues chunks of data (from various sources -- application crashes, kernel log records, etc.).
